thread.title: The world is waiting for you, says Jessica
thread.title_full: The world is waiting for you, says Jessica

title: The world is waiting for you, says Jessica
text:
The world is waiting for you, says Jessica 20th Jul 2015 12:00 AM Flight Centre's Jessica Sullivan: "It's a lot less effort travelling to parts of Australia now with direct flights out of Toowoomba to Sydney." Photo: Flight Centre Related Items Local Real Estate Cars For Sale 
Team leader Jessica Sullivan of Flight Centre Warwick believes her customers dispel the myth that many people wait until their later years to travel. 
"The world is just so accessible now," she said. "With so many airlines, operators and travel deals, there's an experience out there to suit any budget and holiday need. 
"Many of my clients travelled overseas in their younger years and are now putting their focus back onto home soil. It's a lot less effort travelling to parts of Australia now with direct flights out of Toowoomba to Sydney. 
"Uluru is proving to be very popular at the moment. I think we all underestimate the power of seeing an Australian icon for the first time. Unfortunately many of us take what's in our backyard for granted, so I just can't wait to see it for myself one day." 
However, Jessica's visit to Uluru will have to wait, as her next trip is a long-awaited visit to the Grand Canyon. 
"I recently went to New York and did a helicopter flight over the city, as well as a Segway tour of Washington DC's monuments. I'm planning on doing the Grand Canyon in similar fashion. I've planned another helicopter flight as well as a white-water rafting adventure. 
"I also can't wait to go to Lake Louise in Canada. The list never ends!" 
Visit your local Flight Centre for more ultimate journey ideas and if you're looking to travel to the USA, Canada or Central or South America. Do not miss the Discover the Americas Travel Expo exclusive deals available in store at your local Flight Centre on Saturday, July 25, and Sunday, July 26. 
Call Flight Centre for your next holiday on 1300 499 787. holiday
